scripts.test:ci: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:contract
scripts.reports:unit: mkdir -p reports && NODE_OPTIONS=--no-warnings node --loader ts-node/esm --test --test-reporter=junit --test-reporter-destination=reports/unit.junit.xml tests/unit/**/*.test.js
scripts.reports:integration: mkdir -p reports && NODE_OPTIONS=--no-warnings node --loader ts-node/esm --test --test-reporter=junit --test-reporter-destination=reports/integration.junit.xml tests/integration.test.js
scripts.reports:contract: mkdir -p reports && NODE_OPTIONS=--no-warnings node --loader ts-node/esm --test --test-reporter=junit --test-reporter-destination=reports/contract.junit.xml tests/contract/**/*.test.js
scripts.coverage:ci: mkdir -p reports/coverage/v8 && NODE_OPTIONS=--no-warnings NODE_V8_COVERAGE=reports/coverage/v8 node --loader ts-node/esm --test --experimental-test-coverage tests/unit/**/*.test.js tests/integration.test.js tests/contract/**/*.test.js > reports/coverage/summary.txt
